name: Aeroclub Royal de Casablanca (ACRC)
about: Aeroclub Royal de Casablanca (ACRC) is a premier flight training institution based at Tit Mellil Airport in Morocco. ACRC offers both modular and integrated flight training programs, utilizing a fleet of two Cessna 150 and one Cessna 172 aircraft. Instruction is provided by fully qualified instructors, including those with ex-military and jet training backgrounds. The club boasts excellent training conditions with minimal waiting times, allowing students to fly almost exclusively in the circuit. While ground school materials must be secured independently, the club's competitive pricing and experienced instructors make it an attractive option for aspiring pilots. For more information, contact ACRC at +212 22332490. ACRC is committed to providing high-quality flight training in a supportive and efficient environment.
